dllmain_win.c

00001 #ifdef WIN_VERSION
00002 
00003 #include <windows.h>
00004 
00005 BOOL WINAPI DllMain(HINSTANCE hinstDLL, DWORD fdwReason, LPVOID lpReserved ) 
00006 {
00007     // Perform actions based on the reason for calling.    
00008     switch( fdwReason ) 
00009     {         
00010         case DLL_PROCESS_ATTACH:
00011          // Initialize once for each new process.  Return FALSE to fail DLL load.
00012             // Since we do nothing in our DLL_THREAD_ATTACH and DLL_THREAD_DETACH calls below, 
00013             // we don't need to actually receive those calls. The below call tells the OS to 
00014             // optimize those out.  
00015             DisableThreadLibraryCalls(hinstDLL);
00016 #ifdef _DEBUG
00017             {
00018                 char buff[_MAX_PATH];
00019                 OutputDebugString("DLL_PROCESS_ATTACH: ");
00020                 GetModuleFileName(hinstDLL, buff, _MAX_PATH);
00021                 OutputDebugString(buff);
00022                 OutputDebugString("\n");
00023             }
00024 #endif
00025             break;
00026         case DLL_THREAD_ATTACH:         
00027             // Do thread-specific initialization.
00028             break;        
00029         case DLL_THREAD_DETACH:
00030             // Do thread-specific cleanup.            
00031             break;
00032         case DLL_PROCESS_DETACH:        
00033             // Perform any necessary cleanup.
00034             break;    
00035     }    
00036     return TRUE; 
00037 }
00038 
00039 #endif WIN_VERSION
00040
